message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing an initial price of $11,500. I believe this is a fair offer considering its worth to you.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $10,750? This price reflects the true value of the product.
I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $10,200? I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
